entity.name: HAN DAWOOD
entity.title: SHEIKH
entity.address1: WHITE HOUSE, NEAR SAUDI MOSQUE, CLIFTON
entity.sdf: M110522 (issued 11/13/78 Bombay, India); R841697 (issued 11/24/81 Bombay, India); F823692 (Jeddah issued by CGI Jeddah 9/2/89); A501801 (Bombay, India, 7/26/85); K560098 (Bombay, 7/30/75 Indian); V57865 (Bombay, 10/3/83); P537849 (Bombay issued 7/30/79)

A717288 (MISUSE issued 8/18/85, Dubai); G866537 (MISUSE Pakistan issued 8/12/91, Rawalpindi); C-267185 (issued in Karachi in July 1996); H-123259 (issued in Rawalpindi July 2001); G-869537 (issued in Rawalpindi); KC-285901
Date of designation referred to in Article 2a (4) (b): 3.11.2003
Father's name is Sheikh Ibrahim Ali Kaskar, mother's name is Amina Bi, wife's name is Mehjabeen Shaikh.
ISSUED IN BOMBAY, INDIA ON 4 JUNE 1985; REVOKED BY THE GOVERNMENT OF INDIA
